root: ^The neighborhood guys are going to the abandoned house which everybody believes is haunted. What do I do?
^Refuse, as it's school night and I have to get up early
^Say no, but actually go there in secret and scare them to death
^Mock their idea and suggest burning down the haunted house instead

res1: ^It was really creepy! I got scared by somebody's shadow. We all ran away and swore not to tell anybody about it to avoid the mockery
res2: ^In the morning, I learned that those guys had disappeared. Everybody's searching for them, but vainly. This is just the worst nightmare ever!
res3: ^We weren't alone in the house! I screamed with fear, and the three of us ran away and swore to keep quiet about what we saw, to avoid the mockery
res4: ^We brought some petrol and set the house on fire. There was a wild wail, and then it was quiet. What it was, it remained a mystery, forever
